<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clones the function after adding implicit arguments to the argument list</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and returns the new updated function. Preloaded implicit arguments are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// added up to and including the last one that will be preloaded, indicated by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LastPreloadIndex. Currently preloading is only performed on the totality of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sequential data from the kernarg segment including implicit (hidden)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arguments. This means that all arguments up to the last preloaded argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will also be preloaded even if that data is unused.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;cloneFunctionWithPreloadImplicitArgs(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastPreloadIndex) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Check if this argument may be loaded into the same register as the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pad SGPRs for kernarg alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ArgOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a41896492f62ee8d25cf8aaad70bd88aa">alignDown</a>(ArgOffset, 4);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PaddingSGPRs = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Padding, 4) / 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPreloadSGPRs = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(AllocSize, 4) / 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumPreloadSGPRs + PaddingSGPRs &gt; NumFreeUserSGPRs)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pair is the load and the load offset.</span></CodeLine>
